name: Heart of the Secret Source
description: Comes from a now-defunct Secret Source Automaton.  It appears to be an intact core by which the Secret Source Automaton waspowered, a strange device that seems to have been produced as a universalcomponent. According to legend, the ingenious thinkers of antiquity drew uponthe same wisdom used in the creation of golden patterns to design theblueprints by which these extraordinary machines functioned. Perhaps this corewas one of them.
